oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Recommendations for improved procedures for securing consumer oriented food safety and quality of certified organic foods from plough to plate (Organic HACCP)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Using consumer concerns as the main criteria of assessment, the objective of the Concerted Action was to provide recommendations to participants on the chain of production, distribution and consumption in regard to improving the safety and quality of certified organic food products.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Organic HACCP: Recommendations for improved procedures for securing consumer oriented food safety and quality of certified organic foods from plough to plate (Organic HACCP). Runs 2003 - 2005. Project Leader(s): Brandt, Kirsten, University of Newcastle upon Tyne (UNEW).
